Docs.summary: Specifies the visual state of a scroll bar sizing handle that is drawn with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ScrollBarSizeBoxState> values correspond to the states of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.SizeBox> class. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.ScrollBarSizeBoxState> values are also used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer.DrawSizeBox%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
